title: Chef John's Turkey Sloppy Joes
author: John Keller
description: A delicious, quick, and healthy version of the classic sloppy joe using lean turkey meat.
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper for 5 minutes.
Add ground turkey and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Serve on buns or over rice.

title: Brown Sugar Meatloaf
author: Danial Caleem
description: This sweet meatloaf is a comforting classic perfect for family dinners.
steps: Mix brown sugar and half the ketchup, spread in loaf pan.
Combine remaining ingredients and place on top.

title: Awesome Slow Cooker Pot Roast
author: Janet Small
description: Tender and flavorful pot roast made easy in the slow cooker.
steps: Add roast on top and season.

title: Broiled Tilapia Parmesan
author: Alexa Dorchest
description: A simple and tasty tilapia recipe with a cheesy twist.
steps: Mix Parmesan, butter, lemon juice, and basil.

title: Baked Teriyaki Chicken
author: Ben Kaller
description: Oven-baked chicken breasts glazed with a rich teriyaki sauce.
steps: Place chicken in baking dish, pour sauce over.

title: Zesty Slow Cooker Chicken
author: Sam Brown
description: Zingy and easy chicken slow-cooked to perfection.
steps: Add all ingredients to slow cooker.

title: Rosemary Ranch Chicken Kabobs
author: Theresa Samuel
description: Juicy kabobs with a punch of rosemary and ranch flavor.
steps: Marinate chicken in ranch and rosemary 1 hour.

title: Slow Cooker Pulled Pork
author: Adam Brown
description: Tender shredded pork slow-cooked with barbecue sauce.
steps: Place all ingredients in slow cooker.
Shred pork and mix with sauce.

title: Greek Lemon Chicken and Potatoes
author: Thomas Haller
description: A Mediterranean classic with lemon, herbs, and crispy potatoes.
steps: Arrange chicken and potatoes in dish.
Drizzle with oil, lemon juice, and sprinkle oregano.
